## ProgramBuilder.floatBitsToInt() method

Same as floatBitsToInt builtin function in GLSL, only valid for WebGL2 device and WebGPU device

**Signature:**

```typescript
floatBitsToInt(x: number | PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | number \| [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md) |  |

**Returns:**

[PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)
